author: Jonasbauters
post_text: April 25, 2017 at 8:56 PM#1How can i select multiple effects and set groups?Now i have:SetUserVar $groups=("how many groups?")SetUserVar $Effect=(witch effects?")Assign $effect /Groups=$groups

posts.post_text: April 28, 2017 at 1:11 PM#2SetUserVar $groups=("how many groups?")SetUserVar $Effect=("witch effects?") -- ie: 1thru 10Assign effect $effect /Groups=$groups

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: April 28, 2017 at 1:52 PM#3no need to set variables..CodeAssign Effect (which effects?)  /Groups=(how many groups?)

title: Select effects
